reviewText: This will in no way teach your dog to talk to you.  Thanks PBS for getting my hopes and dreams up.
Martha is great. She is funny, educational, and interesting for kids. And adults too!

Our household loves Martha! Our son stumbled across this show on PBS Kids one day and after watching came and told his dad and I he wanted to go outside and ambulate. We didn't know what this meant until we looked it up lol but he learned that word from Martha Speaks. His love for vocabulary has grown so much from this and he retains all the information because it's packed into a fun and interesting story line for kids. This is a total package. Fun and educational!

My nephew adores this! He asked for another one for his birthday. I cried watching the episode about the dogs in the pound! One of the only cartoons I find interesting. If your kid has never watched this, still give it a try. It is amazing. A really good cartoon about a dog who eats alphabet soup and it loses its way from her stomach to her brain. Really cute idea!
She loves it!!  Wish it had huggyface dancing but it doesnt.  :-( that's why I'm rating it 4. Thats my daughters favorite part.
My 3 year old son love Martha- me too! We loved the video!
My grandchild love it, she keep waiting it over and over again. She even knows so of the scripts.
